item.description:
Let's see the remake of F. Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, The Great Gatsby. We will see the 3:15 p.m. show, so we'll meet in the lobby around 2:45 p.m. Please do not be late or you'll have to find us in the theater.

Synopsis:

Nick Carraway, a Midwesterner now living on Long Island, finds himself fascinated by the mysterious past and lavish lifestyle of his neighbor, Jay Gatsby. He is drawn into Gatsby's circle, becoming a witness to obsession and tragedy. Full synopsis

Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tobey Maguire, Carey Mulligan, Isla Fisher, Joel Edgerton

Director: Baz Luhrmann
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby across from the concession counter. I wear glasses; please see my profile for a photo.
item.name: Saturday Afternoon Matinee: "The Great Gatsby" @Hollywood Hits, Danvers
